attributes.action: use the free operating system LINUX in all publicly funded offices, schools, etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: LINUX is a completely free operating system and is better than the Microsoft alternatives.  So why should the country waste money on an inferior product, when there is a free alternative?

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "use the free operating system LINUX in all publicly funded offices, schools,
etc."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11168.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Use-LINUX/
